tfaCode.title: Two-factor authentication code
tfaCode.description: If you have enabled two-factor authentication on your SmartRent account, enter the six-digit code here, then restart Homebridge before the code expires.

unitName.title: Unit name
unitName.description: Only necessary if you have multiple units in your SmartRent account. Get the name from the top of the More tab in the SmartRent app.
